channel.title: Collin K. Berke, Ph.D.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Intro This is my first blog post. I wanted to see how this all works.

item.title: About
item.description: Collin K. Berke, Ph.D. is a media research analyst in public media. Professionally, he uses data and media/marketing research methods to answer questions on how to best reach and engage audiences–towards the goal of enriching lives and engaging minds with public media content and services. He is interested in the use and development of open-source statistical software (i.e. Rstats) to achieve this goal and understand the role it can play in media, digital, and marketing analytics.
